Class SteppableGUIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • mayflower.net.Client
      • TicTacToeClient
        • GuiClient
          • SteppableGUIClient

  • public class SteppableGUIClient
extends GuiClient
    A GUIClient that plays using an AI, but waits for user to click "Do Something" button
